modName: Pilgrims Rest - High Hrothgar Mountain Shack
summary: Adds in a small shack on the path up to High Hrothgar that is aimed at Frostfall users
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b]Pilgrim's Rest - High Hrothgar Mountain Shack[/b][/color][/heading]

This mod adds in a small mountain shack up the path to High Hrothgar. It isn't fancy, there's no unlimited storage, full crafting supplies or fancy decorations. This is truly Skyrim's weather at it's fierce, where only a brave few dare to venture. But when they do, this is where they stop to recuperate. After a while, it became known as Pilgrim's Rest, a place for the devoted to rest and swap tales from their adventures.

This place is designed to be used alongside Chesko's Frostfall Hypothermia Survival mod and has the necessary supplies to avoid freezing to death. The fire outside can be lit by bashing with a torch or by a fire spell. There's a woodchopping block with a spare axe around the other side in case you need to camp out down the road. Inside is two bed rolls, one for you and a follower, and the whole shack and the space around it is navmeshed.

Is this a player home? Yes and no. No, because it lacks so many things, but if you're a hardcore roleplayer, this would be perfect for you. It just depends your personal taste. Location wise, it's under the overhanging where the Frost Troll attacks so watch out when you head there.

Overall features:
* Lightable fire with cooking pot
* Alchemy lab and tanning rack
* Nav-meshed for followers (but it's really cramped in there!) and has been cleaned with TESVEdit
* Safe storage for all containers (except for the secret treasure chest)
* Kynereth shrine and amulet
* A new enchanted weapon on a plaque
~ And more! ~

[color=darkorange]====[b]Video[/b]====[/color]

[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b5TqvcrVemY[/youtube]

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Installation[/b]=====[/color]

Download and drop the file into your data folder. Place meshes into the appropriately named folders.
Or just use the NMM.
To uninstall, just remove the file. Make sure to get your belongings out first though!

[color=darkorange]====[b]Compatibility[/b]====[/color]

[i]Compatible:[/i]
Everything and anything, there are zero scripts and it's a simple little shack in the middle of nowhere.

[i]Incompatible:[/i]
Any other mods that the area where the shack is placed. But, last time I checked, there isn't any player houses around that area.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]
This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.
Credit to Oarisstys for the use of the Mod Resources Pack.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

author: TaeRai
